sect1.title: XML Parsing RECORD and TRANSFORM Functions

para.emphasis: The following functions are valid for use only in field definition expressions within a RECORD structure RECORD structure or TRANSFORM function that is used to define the result set from the PARSE function, or the input RECORD structure for a DATASET containing XML data.

sect1.para: XMLTEXT returns the ASCII text from the xmltag.
XMLUNICODE returns the Unicode text from the xmltag.
XMLPROJECT returns the text from the xmltag as a child dataset.

row.entry: A string constant naming the XPATH to the tag containing the data (see the XPATH Support section under the RECORD structure discussion). This may contain an instance number (such as tagname[1]).
The TRANSFORM function that produces the child dataset.

sect1.para: See Also: PARSE, RECORD Structure, TRANSFORM Structure, DATASET
